scripts.build-win: bun build --target=bun -e sqlite3 -e better-sqlite3 -e mysql2 -e mysql -e pg -e pg-query-stream -e oracledb --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 ./src/application/server/server.ts --outfile ./dist/ops-server-win32.exe
scripts.build-linux: bun build --target=bun -e sqlite3 -e better-sqlite3 -e mysql2 -e mysql -e pg -e pg-query-stream -e oracledb --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 ./src/application/server/server.ts --outfile ./dist/ops-server-linux
scripts.build-linux-old: bun build --target=bun -e pg -e pg-query-stream -e *sqlite3 -e oracledb -e mysql* --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 ./src/application/server/server.ts --outfile ./dist/ops-server-linux
